dcterms:creator: Naimul Haque
Iffat Labiba
Sadia Akter
dcterms:description: A dataset containing comprehensive descriptions of 40 facial attributes such as attractiveness, full lips, big nose, blond hair, brown hair, bushy eyebrows, eyeglasses, male, smile, and youth, used for generating captions for portrait images.
dcterms:title: FaceAttDB

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Ping Luo
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing over 200,000 celebrity images with 10,177 unique identities and various facial attributes, used for various computer vision tasks.
dcterms:title: CelebA

dcterms:creator: Naimul Haque
Abida Sultana
dcterms:description: A multilingual dataset for facial attribute captioning, created from the original FaceAttDB dataset, providing enhanced descriptions for portrait images.
dcterms:title: FaceAttDB
